TopicTitle: How to easily get all the news from the developers

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Every member\'s profile has an option 'Show all posts'. So, all you need to do is to bookmark these links:

Harvester http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;area=showposts;u=3

NovaSilisko http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;area=showposts;u=3905

C7 http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;area=showposts;u=3903

Damion Rayne http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;area=showposts;u=14767

Mu http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;area=showposts;u=25978

N3X15 http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;area=showposts;u=18161

Interesting fact:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13530.msg240642#msg240642

^Harvester listed 20 bugs in this post,

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=16440.msg245514#msg245514

the testing team has helped them find and fix nearly 50 bugs and games take time to develop

20 bugs fixed in X2 and 30 bugs fixed after X2. Huge amount of work. Good luck, Harvester and all the developers!
I don\'t think that Damion is a dev. At least I\'ve never seen him post something to the effect of 'what I worked on for .16 today is...' posts.

So you are advocating cyber stalking? :-[

=P

But anyway, good luck to all those involved in sailing the good ship 0.16

Also, I might add that if you use the advanced search, you can put in the names of the users you wish to include in the search, then give a keyword for said search, allowing one to obtain all that the devs have said on a specific subject if you put the devs\' names in the box.

I don\'t think that Damion is a dev. At least I\'ve never seen him post something to the effect of 'what I worked on for .16 today is...' posts.

He\'s not; he\'s a mod. I suspect most of those posts would be moderator actions.

Damion is a modder, not a dev, but he follows the development process very closely, and usually has very up-to-date information.

He\'s posted an update thread lately to give everyone the news, since we here are quite busy with the experimentals and all, and don\'t always have time to post progress updates.

We\'re doing good progress though. Over 50 issues taken care of already.

Cheers

We\'re doing good progress though. Over 50 issues taken care of already.

Any kind of changelog?
It would be nice to have RSS feeds for specific topics on the forums, that way I could track the dev blogs much easier.

It would be nice to have RSS feeds for specific topics on the forums, that way I could track the dev blogs much easier.

I agree, is there a way to turn on RSS with this forum?

I agree, is there a way to turn on RSS with this forum?

At the bottom of the page there is an RSS link, but that updates with every post that is made throughout the entire forums AFAIK
This Topic has details about setting up a Google RSS feed bundle to follow Squad staff members.
